title: Sleeping with the Enemy
description: Wahida Clark and Kiki Swinson are two mistresses who have the street lit genre on lock.—The RAWSISTAZ Reviewers Enemy in My Bed Wahida ClarkKreesha can't control her dangerous feelings for Reign—a brother who's married, just out of prison, and one strike away from lockdown–for–life. But when Reign betrays her to the Feds, she'll risk everything to save her empire and give Reign one last seduction—with a bullet . . .Keeping My Enemies Close Kiki SwinsonLarissa is fed up with lying, cheating men. Her best friend Tenisha's try a guaranteed–to–be–faithful brother in prison. But when hooking up with Sean lands Larissa behind bars, she'll do whatever it takes to make sure Tenisha and Sean get the ultimate paybac k. . .Includes An Excerpt From Kiki's New Novel!
author: Wahida Clark
